text: Medium Cool is a 1969 American drama movie directed by Haskell Wexler and starring Robert Forster, Verna Bloom, Peter Boyle, Peter Bonerz, Marianna Hill, China Lee. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies about journalists Category:Movies about television Category:Movies about elections
title: Medium Cool
